scripts.build-and-install: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run install-all
scripts.build: npm run build:tsc && npm run generate-third-party-licenses
scripts.bundle: esbuild --bundle src/assets.js --outfile=js/bundle.js && esbuild --bundle src/assets.js --minify --outfile=js/bundle.min.js && mv js/bundle.css _scss/bundle.scss && rm js/bundle.min.css
scripts.install-all: npm run install-icons-and-fonts && npm run bundle && npm run generate-third-party-licenses
scripts.install-icons-and-fonts: npm run install-icons && npm run install-fonts
scripts.install-icons: npm run copy-icons && npm run fix-icons-css
scripts.fix-icons-css: sed -i'.bak' -E 's/url\(\"\./url\(\"\/css\/material-icons/g' css/material-icons/round.css && sed -i'.bak' -E 's/\.material-icons-round/\.material-icons/g' css/material-icons/round.css && rm css/material-icons/*.css.bak
scripts.install-fonts: npm run copy-fonts && npm run copy-fonts-css && npm run fix-fonts-css
scripts.copy-fonts: mkdir -p css/public-sans && cp node_modules/@fontsource/public-sans/files/public-sans-latin-* css/public-sans/ && rm css/public-sans/*-ext-*
